Toggle navigation Toggle navigation Jobsøger Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Virksomhed Hjem Find ny medarbejder Hvorfor it-jobbank Din kundeside Videncenter Om os Om it-jobbank Jobsøger Virksomhed Om os Log ind Opret profil Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Find job Søg Erfaren IT-supporter til Nordic IT Kunne du tænke dig at hjælpe os med at forbedre vores kundeservice igennem IT-support? Har du en ambitiøs målsætning om at levere fremragende service til vores kunder, og kunne du tænke dig at arbejde i en IT-virksomhed med support af vores softwareløsninger? Så vil vi glæde os til at høre fra dig. Til vores serviceafdeling søger vi en engageret medarbejder, der er velbevandret i et Microsoft-miljø. Nordic IT har siden 2002 leveret professionelle, tidsoptimerende IT-systemer til virksomheder, primært inden for det maritime marked. Vi er et team af ambitiøse udviklere, supportere og sælgere, der arbejder hårdt for at optimere virksomheders brug af IT. Vi har igennem de seneste par år befundet os i en vækstsituation, og det er derfor naturligt at udvide vores supportindsats. Derfor søger vi nu en dygtig supporter, der aktivt, i samarbejde med supportafdelingen, skal være med til at udvikle supportafdelingen og vores kundeservice. Om jobbet Du bliver en del af et varieret og resultatorienteret supportteam, hvor god atmosfære og arbejdsmoral er en del af kulturen. I jobbet indgår du i vores service-desk team, hvor du giver vores kunder 1. og 2. level support. Dine arbejdsopgaver vil variere fra daglig telefonsupport til både kundeinstallationer og vedligehold. Derfor er det afgørende, at du befinder dig godt i et job med varierende arbejdsopgaver, hvor det forventes, at du kan varetage dem alle. Endvidere skal du være indstillet på at indgå i vores hotline vagtordning. Om dig Jobbet kræver, at du har høj selvdisciplin, er udadvendt og imødekommende. Du tager selv initiativ samt ansvar for dine arbejdsopgaver, og du arbejder løsningsorienteret. Det er afgørende, at du er i stand til at håndtere flere forskellige opgaver løbende og bevare overblikket over dine opgaver. Dine kompetencer: Du har et bredt kendskab til fejlfinding og support i et Windows-miljø En uddannelse som  IT-supporter, datatekniker eller lignende Gerne +2års erfaring fra en anden supportstilling Du kan arbejde struktureret og selvstændigt Kan indgå i projektarbejde Du kan give realistiske estimater på opgaver og projekter Kan dokumentere og overholde deadlines Velformuleret og behersker både dansk og engelsk på højt niveau Vi tilbyder Et professionelt arbejdsmiljø, hvor du bliver del af en dynamisk organisation med engagerede kollegaer. Vi tilbyder pensionsordning samt frokost. Løn efter kvalifikationer. Arbejdssted Maglebjergvej 6, 2800 Kgs. Lyngby, Danmark. For flere informationer om stillingen kontakt supportchef Casper Thalund: 39403997. Hvis du er interesseret i stillingen, send ansøgning og CV via "Søg jobbet her!" mærket ”supporter”. Vi afholder samtaler løbende. Søg jobbet her Gem job Nordic IT Publiceret: 28. januar 2016 Gem job Arbejdssted Maglebjergvej 6, 2800 Kongens Lyngby Kgs. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område .Net Developer for Sustained Engineering Omada A/S - Danmark Omada continues to grow rapidly and therefore we are looking for a new .NET developer to join our Development Department to help develop our security software product that are used by some of the largest companies in the world. Our product is among the best in the world within our space, and we are therefore also part of Gartner’s Magic Quadrant for our domain. Your responsibilities as .NET developer You will be part of a team that works on our award winning product and will help us enhance the solutions and make sure it keeps being world-class. We work with agile development/Scrum, and you will get to learn from our senior developers and architects. Your assignments will be to reproduce and fix bugs, but also to develop new features in the upcoming versions of our product. It is very important that the quality of our product is very high because it is used by some of the largest international clients in the world, with high requirements for compliance. You will have a good opportunity to use your analytical skills, technical creativity and good interpersonal skills in the job, and you work closely with the rest of the team of developers, testers and technical writers, as well as our support and consulting teams. Your qualifications and experience You probably have a higher IT education such as graduate or master. You have at least 3 years experience with C#/.NET development and you have the right drive and passion for debugging and love the hunt down and fix bugs. On the technology stack we expect that you have: C#/.NET (4.5) Microsoft SQL Server Preferable experience with JavaScript and JQuery but it is not a requirement You like to work both in teams and independently, and solve your tasks on time. Omada – Entrepreneurial and ambitious Omada engage more than 140 people and continues to grow rapidly both profitable and in the number of employees. We are an international company with delivery and sales in both Europe and the US. We have our Headquarter centrally located on Østerbrogade in Copenhagen where we are approximately 20 different nationalities. There is a fantastic entrepreneur atmosphere in the office and a high drive. In the spring of 2015, the UK based investment company C5, invested 25 mio. US Dollars in Omada, to bring the company to the next level. You can read more about Omada here. If you have questions regarding the position please call Senior Recruitment & HR Manager Stefan Buus tel. +45 3122 6211. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område SAP Sales Academy for Early Talent Job SAP - København Requisition ID: 88048 Work Area: Sales Expected Travel: 0 - 100% Career Status: Graduate Employment Type: Regular Full Time COMPANY DESCRIPTION As market leader in enterprise application software, SAP helps companies of all sizes and industries innovate through simplification. From the back office to the boardroom, warehouse to storefront, on premise to cloud, desktop to mobile device – SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively to stay ahead of the competition. SAP applications and services enable customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably. PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES: SAP customers represent 98% of the top 100 most valued brands in the world. Are you ready to become part of SAP’s next generation sales force? We are looking for highly communicative self- starters with a passion for public speaking and who are eager to learn and creative. After completing our 8-month Sales Academy program successfully, you will start your career in one of SAP’s quota carrying sales roles for example selling to various lines of business and industries and selling innovative solutions including the Cloud portfolio. A tenured sales executive typically: Drives software revenue to achieve business goals and sales quota Establishes territory and/or account strategies leveraging targeted sales plays Identifies opportunities with existing customers and/or new prospects Focuses relentlessly on Demand Generation activities Leads a virtual account team Builds relationships and networks internally, with customers, prospects and partners What is the Sales Academy? The program consists of a total of 3 months of classroom learning in Dublin, California in a world class global training center, and 4 months of learning on the job with sales mentors. Your experience with SAP will start with 1 month onboarding in your local SAP office in your home market unit. Throughout the program, you will build the foundations needed for success in the Sales profession. Our experiential learning includes Role Plays, Presentations, Case Studies, White Boarding, Executive Communications and Team Competitions. The Academy teaches the latest innovative solutions, selling techniques and customer engagement strategies. Innovative learning methods include Design Thinking, Pod Coaching, Insight Storytelling, Gamification, and Social Selling, among others. EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS: As part of an experienced account team, your tasks during the program will include: Contribute to the creation of territory business plans Build pipeline through the identification of opportunities and generation of leads (e.g. via social selling, executive prospecting, cold calling, etc.) Maintain CRM system and contribute to your account team’s forecasting Organize and drive customer events Take active role during customer visits (such as demos, strategy whiteboard) Coordinate VAT (Virtual Account Team) and other experts within SAP or the SAP ecosystem to establish strategy for the team’s territory, prospects and customers EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS/SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES: Completion of a Bachelor’s degree with an expectation of being in the top 1/3 of class Preference will be given to graduates with a Sales related degree or concentration in Business Administration, IT, Marketing & Communications and Business Logistics (SCM) Fluent in English and local language, written and spoken Demonstrated leadership in curricular, extra-curricular activities and athletics Strong communication skills including an aptitude and passion for public speaking Creative and resourceful self-starters with strong interpersonal skills who are eager learners Possess a strong desire to work in a dynamic, fast paced sales organization Relationship oriented possessing an aptitude for quickly creating and nurturing connections with others WORK EXPERIENCE 1-2 years of direct work experience in a sales environment and/or internships in one of our focus industries is preferable Relevant coursework/projects that demonstrate your communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a strong work ethic that delivers high quality deliverables SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company. SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com , APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com , EMEA: careers@sap.com ). Requests for reasonable accommodation will be considered on a case-by-case basis. Toggle navigation Toggle navigation Jobsøger Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Virksomhed Hjem Find ny medarbejder Hvorfor it-jobbank Din kundeside Videncenter Om os Om it-jobbank Jobsøger Virksomhed Om os Log ind Opret profil Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Find job Søg Netværks- og systemadministrator til Semler Services Semler Services søger en erfaren Netværks- og systemadministrator til vores IT-Infrastrukturteam. IT-Infrastruktur er en del af Semler Services' IT-Drift afdeling, hvor vi i dag er 23 medarbejdere, som varetager drift af vores Windows server platform, mainframe platform, telefoni og netværk. IT-Infrastrukturteamet består i dag af tre medarbejdere, som ledes af en teamleder, som varetager den daglige tekniske ledelse og koordinering af teamet og dets ressourcer. Semler Services er IT-Services leverandør til bilforhandlere og serviceværksteder, samt importørerne af mærkerne SKODA, SEAT, Audi og Volkswagen. Mere end 3500 brugere anvender dagligt vores IT-services. Jobprofil Som Netværks- og systemadministrator vil dine opgaver blive delt imellem områderne Netværk, AD/VmWare og Drift, med hovedvægten lagt på netværk. Vi forventer, at du har en dyb teknisk viden og minimum 3-5 års erfaring fra en lignende stilling. Dvs. en stilling, hvor du også har taget del i de forskellige driftsopgaver, der er i en Infrastrukturafdeling. I Semler Services anvender vi Service Management baseret på best-practice fra ITIL. Derfor vil kendskab til processerne bag Incident og Change Management være en fordel i denne stilling. Du har høje faglige kompetencer på følgende områder: Netværk MPLS, VPN Cisco: Firewall, switche, router LAN, WAN, VLAN, Routning Sikkerhed Barracuda NGFW Adv. Threat Protection IDM (BYOD) SIEM Du har også kompetencer på følgende områder: VMWare ESX, vCenter, vCops Active Directory DHCP DNS GPO Drift IBM Tivoli Monitoring TADDM IBM BigFix Citrix SolarWinds ITIL Da IT-Infrastruktur er en del af driftsafdelingen forventer vi, at du har dokumenteret erfaring med drift fra en stor driftsorganisation. Personprofil Som person er du udadvendt, åben og positiv med godt humør Du har fokus på kvalitet, er serviceminded og sætter en ære i at yde god service Du formår at skabe tillid i kontakten til kolleger Du skal kunne arbejde struktureret og selvstændigt Kan kommunikere både skriftligt og mundtligt Kan dokumentere løste opgaver Du sætter teamets mål og ansvar højt Vi tilbyder Et afvekslende job i en virksomhed, der er i udvikling, og hvor der er mulighed for at komme til at arbejde med de nyeste teknologier. Løn efter kvalifikationer. Ansøgning Søg venligst online via linket "Søg jobbet" nederst på siden. Ansøgninger vil blive behandlet løbende, men seneste ansøgningsfrist er den 15. februar 2016. Ønsker du yderligere oplysninger om stillingen kan du kontakte Infrastruktur teamleder Marcus Niebuhr på +45 4328 8027 eller på e-mail mmn@semler.dk , eller IT-driftschef Claus Nybro på +45 4328 8020 eller på e-mail cny@semler.dk . Arbejdssted: Semler Services Banemarksvej 4 2605  Brøndby Danmark Søg jobbet her Gem job Semler Services A/S Publiceret: 28. januar 2016 Gem job Arbejdssted Banemarksvej 4, 2605 Brøndby Brøndby Job hos virksomheden Kørende supporter til Semler Services del jobbet Islands Brygge 57 DK-2300 København S Telefon 70 22 93 00 it-jobbank er Danmarks førende jobportal for it-folk og med en klar vision om at være foretrukken rekrutteringspartner for virksomheder.
Vi hjælper med din jobsøgning og har jobopslag og ledige stillinger inden for alle områder af it: Fx .net, Linux, Sitecore og frontend samt jobtitler som fx programmør, webudvikler, it-supporter, it-projektleder, driftschef og it-chef.

Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Solution Architect EMEA Sitecore - København We are looking for an energetic and outgoing Solution Architect with a solid background in Computer Science, with CMS knowledge and experience in IT (.NET) architecture, to join our team out of Copenhagen, Denmark. You will be working with clients and colleagues across Europe but with focus on the Scandinavian market. This is an excellent opportunity for an energetic and outgoing individual to thrive in the web technology sector in a fun, dynamic, profitable, fast-growing, high-tech organization with career options across the globe. About Sitecore Sitecore is the global leader in experience management software. The Sitecore® Experience Platform™ manages content, supplies contextual intelligence, and automates communications, at scale. It empowers marketers to deliver content in context of how customers have engaged with their brand, across every channel, in real time. This context marketing is the only way to manage meaningful customer experiences that delight audiences, build loyalty, and drive revenue. More than 4,400 of the world’s leading brands—including American Express, Carnival Cruise Lines, easyJet, and L'Oréal—trust Sitecore to help them deliver the personalized interactions that win loyal customers. Key Responsibilities and Deliverables Consult our partners & customers on how best to implement Sitecore products Provide expert knowledge and guidance on Sitecore architecture and implementation design Build deep expertise in select Sitecore modules to become both internal and external Subject Matter Expert and principal across EMEA. Contribute to Sitecore community with your expertise Provide key input from the field to Product Managers and architects. Instruct Sitecore Certified Developer courses Knowledge and Experience 5+ years of industry experience with majority in Web Content Management space. Excellent skills in combining business and technology Experience in senior role with architecture and web development Strong consultancy background Excellent communication skills, able to articulate key messages very clearly Solid understanding of the Microsoft .NET technology stack Results orientation, you won’t be satisfied until the job is done with the right quality! Self-motivated, you have the natural drive to learn and pick up new challenges Technical/IT education, university degree The successful candidate has excellent communication and presentation skills. You are able to speak and write in both English and Danish fluently. You must be willing to travel up to 15% in consultation with manager. At Sitecore we encourage self-thinking and liberty to work as an individual. You will be part of a global success, and enter an entrepreneurial organization with extremely high growth rates, and highly motivated employees. You will be working in an international environment, together with other skilled professionals, that knows how to think big and win deals. Apply Please upload your CV and cover letter detailing your experience, suitability and salary expectations for the role. We look forward to hearing from you. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område iOS Developers at Unwire Unwire Aps - København Job Description Unwire has a growing pipeline and will need new talents to deliver the most innovative, demanding, exciting and high-profiled mobile payment and ticketing solutions in the market. We now look for iOS developers to expand our User Experience & Apps department. As a developer at Unwire you will be taking apps from initial concept to finished product, and see it work in the hands of thousands of users. We create complex applications, relying on elaborate backend systems, handling critical data in delicate environments. User experience, reliability and reusability are critical to us. At Unwire you will be part of defining, evaluating and implementing great solutions for our customers and ensuring a high quality in usability, code and processes. We will give you a challenging work environment with motivated and inspiring colleagues where you will be able to work with and explore the forefront of mobile development. Join us in creating leading mobile payment and ticketing solutions for Unwire’s worldwide customers! Responsibilities Write beautiful, flexible and maintainable code optimized for the mobile platform Collaborate with designers and project managers to create elegant solutions Engage and participate in defining strong APIs and integrate against middleware services Drive and maintain highest quality from implementation to end user experience Qualifications General requirements A strong understanding of object oriented programming and design patterns A “best practices” approach and a passion for code quality, testing and craftsmanship An emphasis on aesthetics and focus on usability and user experience design A self motivated individual able to work and take decisions independently iOS developer requirements A solid foundation in Objective C, iOS development and building apps with UIKit, experimentation with Swift is big plus Fluent in modern Objective C and using ARC, blocks, GDC, KVO etc. Confident developing with Xcode, using interface builder and Instruments Experience with CoreData, CoreLocation, MapKit, CoreAnimation/Graphics and AFNetworking General plusses Experience with networking, multithreading, data parsing and persistence Experience with unit testing and test practices, debugging and bug reporting Experience with PHP, Java7, jBoss7, RESTEasy and RESTful web services Experience with app deployment, AppStore, Google Play, certificates and provisioning profiles Experience with version control and continuous integration, GIT/SVN, Maven, Jenkins, Bamboo etc. Experience with Photoshop, Pixelmator Jira, SSH, MySQL, Wiki, documentation …if you can start immediately… Additional Information As an Unwire employee you will be offered: Opportunities to form the leading edge developments on payment, ticketing and messaging services A chance to continuously learn and grow while creating cutting-edge apps and solutions for our customers Great teamwork and colleagues An opportunity to grow in your career Competitive salary and benefits Are you the candidate we seek? Send CV/LinkedIn profile/Links to your work to: VP of User Experience & Apps, Lars Knutsen by following the link on this page. Bettina Wæde assists Unwire in this process. We’ll be processing applications as they arrive and can promise quick feedback. Danish work permit required. Positions are only open for our location in Copenhagen, Denmark. Stillingen er på 27 timer pr. uge fordelt på fem dage i tidsrummet mellem kl. 10.00 og 17.00. Det forventes at timerne vil svinge fra uge til uge, alt efter hvilke opgaver der skal løses. Der arbejdes efter årsnorm. Som it-medhjælper skal du Være receptionist. Det betyder, at du hver dag fra kl. 14-17 skal varetage en receptionistliggende funktion. Du skal være serviceminded og smilende, hjælpe børn og forældre i UFOens modtagelse. Du skal tage telefonen, være behjælpelig i vores elektroniske system og ved forældrehenvendelser. Udføre it-service og it-administration. Derfor skal du være interesseret i de mange facetter der er i udviklingen og vedligeholdelse af it. Være med til at opbygge og vedligeholde hjemmeside, Tabulex og Intrasystem. Selvstændigt tage initiativ til at mangfoldiggøre brugen af forskellige digitale redskaber og medier i samarbejde med det pædagogiske personale. Vi forventer, at du Har erfaring og viden indenfor det digitale område Kan holde hovedet koldt og tage en travl og hektisk hverdag med et smil Er stabil, positiv og engageret Er selvkørende, ansvarsbevidst og god til at følge opgaverne til dørs. KKFO UFOen har dagligt åbent fra kl. 6.15 - 8.00 og igen kl. 14.00 - 17.00. Vi er 14 pædagoger, 13 pædagogmedhjælpere og to medarbejdere, som benyttes til forskellige driftsopgaver. Vi har lokaler på en af de nyeste skoler i Københavns Kommune og modtager kun børn fra Utterslev Skole. Du er velkommen til at kontakte os på 3366 9200. Du skal tale med KKFO-leder Jeanette H. Larsson eller KKFO-souschef Paul Hollander, hvis du har spørgsmål om stillingen. Du kan også læse mere om os på: http://www.utterslevskole.kk.dk . Løn- og ansættelsesforhold sker efter HK overenskomst. Der indhentes såvel børne- og straffeattester samt reference hos tidligere arbejdsgiver før ansættelse og tiltrædelse af stillingen. Hvis du vil søge stillingen hos os Skriv en motiveret ansøgning. Vedhæft eksamensbevis, cv og eventuelt relevante udtalelser. Ved ansættelse indhentes børne- og straffeattester. Søg stillingen via nedenstående link senest torsdag den 11. februar 2016. Ansættelsessamtaler finder sted hurtigst muligt efter ansøgningsfristen. Du vil blive kontaktet pr. telefon, hvis du skal til samtale.
